item.title: vintage_yamaha
item.description: love at first sight Last month got two pieces of very old audio equipment off of eBay-kleinanzeigen. Admittedly I mostly got interested in the amp, because of its gorgeous design. While reading up on it1 I discovered that it was tremendously well received when Yamaha introduced it in 1981. Then it cost 1,200 DM (1,367 Euros in 20212). As I still like to listen to the radio naturally I needed a nice tuner as well.
